title: Fix backend connection error and eliminate all errors

requirements.text: Debug and fix the 'Unable to connect to backend' error that prevents the application from establishing communication with the backend canister

quotes: Unable to connect to backend fix this

acceptanceCriteria: The frontend successfully connects to the backend canister without connection errors
The useBackendActor hook returns a valid actor instance
Backend canister responds to health check or basic queries
No 'Unable to connect to backend' errors appear in the browser console or UI

requirements.text: Verify that the canister ID configuration is correct in the frontend and matches the deployed backend canister
acceptanceCriteria: Frontend references the correct canister ID for the backend
Canister ID environment variables or configuration files are properly set
Actor initialization uses the correct canister ID

requirements.text: Ensure the backend canister is properly deployed and responding to queries
acceptanceCriteria: Backend canister is deployed and running
Backend canister accepts and responds to query calls
No runtime errors in the backend canister

requirements.text: Implement comprehensive error handling in useBackendActor to provide clear error messages when backend connection fails
acceptanceCriteria: Error messages clearly indicate the type of connection failure
Users see actionable error messages with suggested fixes
Error logging captures connection failure details for debugging

requirements.text: Eliminate all runtime errors, console warnings, and exceptions throughout the application

quotes: make sure there is no errors after this update

acceptanceCriteria: No unhandled exceptions in frontend code
No console errors or warnings during normal application flow
All error states are handled gracefully with user-friendly messages
Backend queries and mutations complete successfully without errors

constraints: Maintain existing authentication flow with Internet Identity
Preserve all existing features and functionality
Keep single-actor backend architecture in backend/main.mo
nonGoals: Adding new features beyond fixing the connection issue
Redesigning the UI or user flows
